front.title: Requirement for Information extension in electro-optical multi-layer network

abstract.t: This memo provides extending information for electro-optical multi-layer network under the control of Generalized MPLS(GMPLS). Inparticular we provide electro-optical conversion capability thatdescribes the function between Optical Cross Connect(OXC) and DigitalCross Connect(DXC). The information of electro-optical conversioncapability is used for extending multi-layer network(MLN) informationmodel and Wavelength Switched Optical network(WSON) informationmodel.
